thread.title: Relive the emotional sights and sounds from what was likely Paul Pierce's last game in Boston
thread.title_full: Relive the emotional sights and sounds from what was likely Paul Pierce's last game in Boston

title: Relive the emotional sights and sounds from what was likely Paul Pierce's last game in Boston
text:
Paul Pierce likely played his final game in Boston Sunday, as his visiting Clippers lost 107-102 to the Celtics.
The Celtics organization and their fans honored Pierce, who spent 15 seasons in Boston, throughout the game ‚Äî from his entrance to his last-second three.
Here were some of the highlights from Pierce‚Äôs emotional farewell:
Pierce traveled to Boston on Friday:
Behind-the-scenes with @paulpierce34 as he makes his final visit to Boston! @LAClippers / @Celtics #NBAonABC NOW! pic.twitter.com/FVHS0Y18Nd
‚Äî NBA (@NBA) February 5, 2017
Out of habit, he almost went to the Celtics locker room when he arrived at TD Garden:
. @paulpierce34 has arrived at the @tdgarden for the final time as a player #Celtics pic.twitter.com/B3TdZk99rs
‚Äî CSN New England (@CSNNE) February 5, 2017
He chatted with Celtics announcers Tommy Heinsohn and Mike Gorman before the game:
Hear Paul Pierce "wired" in his final game in Boston! #NBAonABC pic.twitter.com/e1sv14zyrl
‚Äî NBA (@NBA) February 5, 2017
Pierce was greeted by cheers when he entered the arena:
The Truth makes an emotional final entrance to the TD Garden! #NBAonABC pic.twitter.com/YCb3Em5ODd
‚Äî NBA (@NBA) February 5, 2017
And fans erupted when he was introduced with the Clippers‚Äô starting lineup:
The Truth. pic.twitter.com/zd7gEHHJtA
‚Äî NBA (@NBA) February 5, 2017
He gave Lucky a kiss before tip off:
One last kiss for Lucky from The Truth ‚òòÔ∏è pic.twitter.com/AgEkgru7Ep
‚Äî SportsCenter (@SportsCenter) February 5, 2017
And the Celtics honored him with a video tribute during a timeout:
Boston rises for a tribute to Paul Pierce! üçÄ #NBAonABC pic.twitter.com/shrwXhw1d0
‚Äî NBA (@NBA) February 5, 2017
Paul Pierce really felt that ovation ‚òòÔ∏èüëè pic.twitter.com/nMCwZIh3g3
‚Äî NBA on ESPN (@ESPNNBA) February 5, 2017
#ThankYouPaul ‚òòÔ∏è‚òòÔ∏è pic.twitter.com/0SRs5QuxmL
‚Äî Boston Celtics (@celtics) February 5, 2017
Pierce put an exclamation point on his day with a late three-pointer:
Watch and listen as the Boston faithful give Paul Pierce a hero's farewell. #NBAonABC pic.twitter.com/OKeMKd087R
‚Äî NBA (@NBA) February 5, 2017
‚ÄúI‚Äôve been enjoying every moment of it,‚Äù he said after the game. ‚ÄúThese great fans, they truly appreciate what I‚Äôve been able to do for this franchise, and I just really feel the love, and I‚Äôm thankful to be able to come in here one last time.‚Äù
The Truth discusses what Boston means to him after his final game at TD Garden. #NBAonABC pic.twitter.com/xQcGhOBNRH
‚Äî NBA (@NBA) February 5, 2017
